bee-common-widget-bar.row-paragraph: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-text: Behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-title-bullet-point: On her way she met a copy.
bee-common-widget-bar.row-title-main: RIGHT AT THE COAST OF THE SEMANTICS

bee-controller.error-loading-template: Oops! Something went wrong while loading your message.
bee-controller.warning-loading-template: Your message was loaded in compatibility mode. Some features may not be available.
bee-controller.error-browser: We detected an outdated browser (${browserName} ${browserVersion}) that is no longer supported.
bee-controller.error-browser-details: This application works best on Chrome, Firefox, Edge and Safari.

bee-newsletter-modules-html.html: I'm a new HTML block.
bee-newsletter-modules-html.widget-warning-desc: Using your own code may affect how the message is rendered. Make sure to use correct and responsive HTML.

mailup-bee-app.prevent-close-confirm: Leaving this page your changes will be lost! Do you really want to leave this page?

mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.description: Note that background images are not compatible with all email programs. When not supported, the row background color will be used instead. So make sure that color works well with your content.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.label: Row background image
mailup-bee-common-widgets-background-ima.name: Image name

mailup-bee-common-widgets-dynamic-image.description: When 'Dynamic image' is enabled, 'Url' becomes the location of a sample image shown in the editor. 'Dynamic Url' will be used in the HTML code. The size of the dynamic image will be set based on the sample one, so use a sample image of the same size.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-dynamic-image.label: Dynamic image

mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.fullwidth-blocked: This image is bigger than the container, so it is automatically set to 'Adjust to width'.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.label: Align
mailup-bee-common-widgets-image-align.switch-off-automatic: Switch off 'Automatic image resizing' to manually resize the image.

mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.delete-confirmation-description: Be careful. You will not be able to restore it once removed.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.delete-confirmation-title: Do you really want to remove this display condition?
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.label: Display condition
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.name: Name
mailup-bee-common-widgets-row-display-co.no-condition: No display condition applied to this row

mailup-bee-common-widgets-video-content.description: Add a YouTube or Vimeo URL to automatically generate a preview image. The image will link to the provided URL.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-video-content.label: Video url

mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-empty.label: No content here. Drag new from 'Content' panel.
mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-empty.name: Empty

mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-text.html: I'm a new Text block ready for your content.
mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-text.name: Text

mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-configrmation-title: Are you sure you want to delete this?
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-module-in-locked-row-error-messag: This row is locked and therefore its content cannot be edited.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-module-in-locked-row-error-title: This content block cannot be deleted
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-row-locked-content-error-message: This row contains locked content and therefore cannot be deleted.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.duplicate-module-in-locked-row-error-mes: This row is locked and therefore its content cannot be duplicated.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.duplicate-module-in-locked-row-error-tit: This content block cannot be duplicated
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.duplicate-row-locked-content-error-messa: This row contains locked content and therefore cannot be duplicated.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.locked-module-warning-message: Locked content blocks cannot be edited.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.locked-row-warning-message: This row is locked and therefore its content cannot be edited.
mailup-bee-newsletter-stage.delete-column-confirmation-message:
All the modules in this column will also be deleted.
This action cannot be undone.

mailup-common-file-manager.delete-confirm-title: Are you sure you want to delete this file?
mailup-common-file-manager.delete-folder-text: Before deleting it you must delete or move its content
mailup-common-file-manager.empty-folder: Empty Folder, upload some files here.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-1055: Your username is already in use. This may happen if the application is opened in multiple browser windows, or you are using a shared account.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3100: Something went wrong while accessing the backend filesystem.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3300: Permission denied to access a file or a directory.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3500: Server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3600: Not a valid S3 custom storage.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-403: You don't have permission to access this file or a directory.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-404: The file or directory was not found.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-409: The file or directory already exists.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-uploading: Oops! Something went wrong while uploading the image.
mailup-common-file-manager.multi-delete-confirm-title: Are you sure that you want delete this {{multiDeleteItems}} files?
mailup-common-file-manager.overwrite-confirm-message: A previously uploaded file with the same name will be overwritten. This action cannot be undone.
mailup-common-file-manager.overwrite-confirm-title: Are you sure you want to overwrite this file?
mailup-common-file-manager.read-only-tooltip: This label indicates that you can't modify the content of this folder. Please browse to another folder and try again.
mailup-common-file-manager.search-noresults-text: Try with a different term or change folder
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-creative-commons: All images are published under the Creative Commons Zero license
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-description: Find free high-quality images for your campaigns from more than 500,000 stock photos.
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-no-result-description: Please, check the spelling or try more unspecific terms.
mailup-common-file-manager.stock-images-no-result-title: Sorry, we couldn't find images that match your search
mailup-common-file-manager.title: File manager
mailup-common-file-manager.upload-status-error: {{items}} of {{totalItems}} files could not be uploaded.
mailup-common-file-manager.validation-name-special-characters: contains invalid characters (< > : " / \\ | ? * characters are not permitted)
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-create-folder-body: The label {{readOnly}} indicates that you can't modify the content of this folder. Please browse to another folder and try again.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-create-folder-title: Warning! You can’t create any folder inside this folder.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-upload-body: The label {{readOnly}} indicates that you can't modify the content of this folder. Please browse to another folder and try again.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-cant-upload-title: Warning! You can’t upload any files to this folder.
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-delete-files: It is not possible to delete this
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-delete-folder: Only empty folders can be deleted
mailup-common-file-manager.warning-unsupported-file-extension:
Oops, there’s a problem uploading your file.
The file format is not supported.
mailup-common-file-manager.error-3410: File exceeds the maximum allowed size.

mailup-common-page-preview.disclaimer-description: Consistently displaying an email across devices is a challenge. Responsive design provides a solution. This message will display properly in many mobile clients. The desktop version will be used when responsive design is not supported.
mailup-common-page-preview.error: Oops! Something went wrong with the preview.

mailup-bee-newsletter-modules-text.html:
What about me?


I'm a text block ready for your content.


Use the toolbar to change the text properties and insert links.

row-display-condition-custom.after-placeholder: Insert the end of the conditional statement
row-display-condition-custom.all-fields-required-error-message: Oops! One or more required fields are missing or invalid.
row-display-condition-custom.before-placeholder: Insert the start of the conditional statement
row-display-condition-custom.duplicate-entry-error-message: Oops! You defined a condition that is already available. Please select it from the list or create a new one using a different name, description, and conditions.
row-display-condition-custom.name: Name

mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.label: Label
mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.no-fields: There are no fields configured. Please edit the form to add some.
mailup-bee-common-widgets-form.options-notes: Type the available options for this field. If you need a label to go with a value, use a pipe "|" to separate them (e.g., California | CA)

mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.locked-module-warning-message: This module is being edited by another user.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.locked-row-warning-message: This row is being edited by another user.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.row-delete-confirm-title: Are you sure you want to delete this row?
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.row-delete-confirm-message: Another user is currently editing a module inside this row. By deleting it, you might cause their work to be lost.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.lock-rejected-title: Element was locked by another user.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.lock-rejected-message: The element is currently being edited by another user. Please wait until they are finished with their changes.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.overlay-error-message: Error occurred during the co-editing session
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.page-change-failed-title: The requested edit could not be applied.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.page-change-failed-message: The edit had a conflict that could not be automatically resolved. Please try again.
mailup-bee-newsletter-collaboration.delete-rejected-message: Another user is working in the same row.

mailup-bee-common-widgets-id.description: The ID can be used as an internal reference in the content. Setting an ID for a module makes it available for selection in the link options. When not automatically generated, make sure to use unique identifiers.

mailup-bee-carousel.first-slide-sizing-rule: First-positioned image will determine the aspect of the carousel. The following images will adapt their ratio to the carousel.
